name: MCVertt
description:
'''Mohamed Camara''', known professionally as '''MCVertt''' ({{respell|m|c|_|vertt}}; born June 18, 2003), is an American record producer and songwriter from [[Newark, New Jersey]]. He is best known for his production on [[Lil Uzi Vert]]'s 2022 single "[[Just Wanna Rock]]", which entered the top ten of the US [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]. He is recognized for his [[producer tag]], "MC, make another hit!".

Since 2021, he has worked extensively with artists such as Sugarhill Ddot, BBG Steppaa, [[Sexyy Red]], [[IShowSpeed]], and [[ASAP Ferg|A$AP Ferg]].
